summary: This bill, the DeOndra Dixon INCLUDE Project Act of 2025, aims to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct research, training, and investigation related to Down syndrome. The INCLUDE Project (INvestigation of Co-occurring conditions across the Lifespan to Understand Down syndromE Project) would focus on areas like basic science, clinical trials, biomarkers, co-occurring conditions, and improving the quality of life for individuals with Down syndrome. The Secretary is mandated to coordinate research, avoid duplication, provide technical assistance, and submit biennial reports to Congress.
